email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225m. Our initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric ton.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 25 per metric ton seems a bit high for our budget. Could you provide more details on the laycan dates and the demurrage rate per day? Also, is there any flexibility in the freight rate?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 23 per metric ton. The laycan dates are from 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-15, and the demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of USD 23 per metric ton is acceptable. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements for the OCEAN HARMONY.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee
